name: Sadie's Stabby Sword Story
description:
Sadie, a sweet sovereign, spots a sacred sword set on shielding her from scary slimes. Stay sharp so Sadie stays safe.

Click and drag anywhere on the screen to launch the sword! We recommend playing in fullscreen mode if you often drag your cursor outside of the window.

A beat-em-up artillery game made in three days for Ludum Dare 41: "Combine two incompatible genres." Ranked 166th overall, and 62nd in the "fun" category, out of 2000+ Ludum Dare Jam entries!

Changelog

Version 1.31
Fixed a bug where shield slimes could be pushed offscreen. Added fullscreen support. 

Version 1.3
Fixed a bug that prematurely ended the game at Level 4 instead of Level 5.

Version 1.2
Fixed a bug that prematurely ended the game at Level 3 instead of Level 5.

Version 1.1
Fixed a bug that prevented players who restarted a level from advancing to the next level after defeating all enemies.
